p.span: Click here to access all PreK-6 lesson videos and learning materials for your child. These items will be updated on a weekly basis by our teachers for as long as we are closed.

h2.a: Hammondsport Reads Website- Listen to Books Read Aloud, Including Many by Our Curtiss School Teachers

span.div: The mission of the Hammondsport Central School District, a high-performing unique learning community, is to provide a dynamic, quality education to a close-knit and diverse population, and to ensure that all students are prepared to compete in an ever changing global society by challenging each student through superior, innovative educational opportunities while promoting responsible citizenship through strong character and moral development.
